cast.overview: American expat Mickey Pearson has built a highly profitable marijuana empire in London. When word gets out that he’s looking to cash out of the business forever it triggers plots, schemes, bribery and blackmail in an attempt to steal his domain out from under him.
cast.title: The Gentlemen

details.biography: With over 19 years of experience in the industry, Simon has worked extensively both as an actor and a creative. Creative Experience. He is known for  The Machines that Built America (2021), The Gentlemen (2020), Disney’s Cinderella (2015), The Callback Queen (2013), De-Lovely (2004) Original West End casts: The Producers, Wicked, Jersey Boys (Bob Crewe), Viva Forever (Leon). Chicago, Cats, Jerry Springer the Opera, Annie Get Your Gun, Singin’ In The Rain, Copacabana.
details.name: Simon Adkins
